A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the star wars movie I've been waiting 40 years for\, visually extraordinary\, emotional\,  evoking and explosive.. Yes there are bits that are a bit superfluous but taken as a whole this is a piece of cinema magic that hasn't made me as engaged with a film as I was back as a 5 years old in 77... Adam Driver is simply brilliant throughout as is Mark Hamill... This has to be seen whether you are a fan of the genre or previous instalments or not.. I'm genuinely not sure how episode 9 is going to live up to this..
